description: The perfect combination to celebrate Christmas in July. Try this Turkey and Potatoes recipe tonight. Enjoy succulent Inghams roast turkey breast with all the classic sides, Birds Eye rosemary and garlic roast potatoes, green beans, cranberry sauce and, of course, gravy.
keywords: Dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Turkey,Sesame free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Turkey Breast Roast with Rosemary and Garlic Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg Ingham’s Turkey Breast ready to roast
600g Bird's Eye Deli Roast Potatoes, Rosemary & Garlic

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat conventional oven to 180°C (170°C Fan Forced).
Remove Turkey from plastic packaging. DO NOT REMOVE FOIL.
Place product on rack in an oven proof dish with 1/2 cup water.
Cook for 1 hour 30 minutes from thawed or 2 hours from frozen.
40 minutes before Turkey is cooked, remove foil and baste with a small amount of cooking oil to allow self-basting and browning.
Meanwhile, arrange Potatoes in a single layer on a separate oven tray and place in the oven with the Turkey for the remaining 40 min
Remove Turkey from oven and allow 10 minutes to rest before carving
Increase the temperature of the oven to 220°C, continue to cook Potatoes while the Turkey rests for the 10 min until golden brown.
In the meantime, trim 500g of Green beans & boil water in a medium sized pot.
Add the beans and cover, steam for 4 to 5 minutes then drain.
